segments.text: What's up , Bro ? What's in the bulletin ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It says that there will be a blackout from 5 p . m . to 7 p . m . in our neighborhood today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Blackout ? Even the TV has the limit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you know you will look like a monster in the blackout ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oops , no , Daddy can't watch American Idol , either !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not the point . Come on , can you imagine that there will be no electricity on such a hot day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , since you are the smart one , can you come up with a better plan ? So that we won't be baked like cookies here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about playing Barbie out there in the neighborhood ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Barbie ? You know , I might be seven , but I'm not a girl .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a better plan ?
segments.speaker: S2
